alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 2:35PM CST until January 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM MONDAY TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 above zero. * WHERE...Tyler, Northern Jasper and Northern Newton Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Monday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM Monday to 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Visit www.drivetexas.org for road information.
